Question
========
  
Evaluate the following two statements about test reliability and validity.

I. To estimate the reliability of an intelligence test, the test should be administered at least twice to the same group of respondents. II. By definition, a test score that is not valid is also an unreliable test score.


Answerlist
----------
* I is correct, II is correct
* I is true, II is false
* I is not correct, II is correct
* I is not right, II is not right
